results.title: A Nonsense Mitochondrial DNA Mutation Associates with Dysfunction of HIF1alpha in a Von Hippel-Lindau Renal Oncocytoma
results.text_hl: We propose that the protumorigenic role of @GENE_HIF1A @GENE_3091 @@@HIF1alpha@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_von_Hippel_Lindau_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006623 @@@VHL cancers@@@ may be blunted through drugs inhibiting mitochondrial respiratory complexes, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: De Luise M, Guarnieri V, Ceccarelli C, D'Agruma L, Porcelli AM, Gasparre G. A Nonsense Mitochondrial DNA Mutation Associates with Dysfunction of HIF1alpha in a Von Hippel-Lindau Renal Oncocytoma Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2019;2019():8069583. PMID: 30728892
